code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{collection,query,where,getDocs}from"firebase/firestore";import{onAuthStateChanged}from"firebase/auth";import{auth,db}from"../firebaseConfig";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ResearcherDashboard(){const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{onAuthStateChanged(auth,async user=>{if(user){const q=query(collection(db,"projects"),where("ownerId","==",user.uid));const snapshot=await getDocs(q);const data=snapshot.docs.map(doc=>({id:doc.id,...doc.data()}));setProjects(data);setLoading(false);}});},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Project Listings"}),projects.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You have no projects yet."}):projects.map(proj=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:proj.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:proj.description})]},proj.id))]});}export default ResearcherDashboard;
